attributes.title: Camp Betrayal | Official Trailer
attributes.caption: 9 contestants compete for their lives by completing challenges for their evil host The Babbadour. Each episode, contestants are randomly chosen to lie, backstab, and sabotage the team’s chance at success.
attributes.description: 9 contestants compete for their lives by completing challenges for their evil host The Babbadour. Each episode, contestants are randomly chosen to lie, backstab, and sabotage the team’s chance at success, but can they keep their role a secret? Find out when Camp Betrayal premieres July 13 on Rooster Teeth!

attributes.title: No Body Left Behind
attributes.caption: Nine contestants arrive at Camp Betrayal to see who is the best at lying, deceiving and betraying their friends.
attributes.description: Nine contestants arrive at Camp Betrayal to see who is the best at lying, deceiving and betraying their friends. For their first game, the unwilling campers must visit the scene of a gruesome murder to reassemble body parts into zombie butlers. But who among them is sabotaging their mission? And who will be eliminated and sent home… to death?

attributes.title: A “Friend” for Dinner
attributes.caption: Our contestants are forced to prepare and eat a cannibal feast in this devilish cooking competition! But who will sabotage the dinner…? And who will be sent home to die?!
attributes.description: Our contestants are forced to prepare and eat a cannibal feast in this devilish cooking competition! But who will sabotage the dinner…? And who will be sent home to die?!

attributes.title: Seance It Ain’t So
attributes.caption: Trapped in a graveyard and seance tent, our contestants must somehow summon seven spirits to survive this escape room puzzle.
attributes.description: Trapped in a graveyard and seance tent, our contestants must somehow summon seven spirits to survive this escape room puzzle. But as the saboteurs turn everyone against each other, all chaos breaks loose.

attributes.title: Saw and Disorder: Human Victims Unit
attributes.caption: In a demonic twist, the Babadour secretly makes ALL players minions and traps them in a cruel game where they must cut off arms and maneuver as a human-centipede in order to escape!
attributes.description: In a demonic twist, the Babadour secretly makes ALL players minions and traps them in a cruel game where they must cut off arms and maneuver as a human-centipede in order to escape!
attributes.display_title: S1:E4 - Saw and Disorder: Human Victims Unit

attributes.title: The Stuff of Nightmares!
attributes.caption: In our penultimate episode, the remaining players must murder sleeping victims by entering their dreams and recreating their worst nightmares!
attributes.description: In our penultimate episode, the remaining players must murder sleeping victims by entering their dreams and recreating their worst nightmares! However, the Babadour has another evil twist up his overly long sleeves! Who will survive and make it to the finale of Camp Betrayal?

attributes.title: The Path to Betrayal
attributes.caption: In the finale of Camp Betrayal, the final three contestants compete in a sinister challenge filled with lies, torment, and sabotage only to discover one final twist concocted by the Babadour.
attributes.description: In the finale of Camp Betrayal, the final three contestants compete in a sinister challenge filled with lies, torment, and sabotage only to discover one final twist concocted by the Babadour.
